groupSPV.controller

Class Utils

  • java.lang.Object
    • groupSPV.controller.Utils

  • public class Utils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class acts as a utility class for the entire project. Methods that are used in more than one place can be placed here as static methods to avoid duplicating code.
    Author:
    Frank Fasola, James Donnell, Spencer Escalante, Trevor Silva

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static boolean currentNetwork
      Current network.
      private static java.lang.String defaultPath
      Default path name, unrelated to appdata folder.

      Utils()

      • getSystemPath

        public static java.lang.String getSystemPath(java.lang.String path)
        Returns User's full 'AppData' path if Windows, blank string if not.
        Parameters:
        path - The path to the file inside of the SeniorProject_Bitcoin_Client directory.
        Returns:
        'AppData' full path.

        Returns:

      • setMinimumDecimalPlaces

        public static java.math.BigDecimal setMinimumDecimalPlaces(java.math.BigDecimal bigDecimal,
                                                           int minDecimalPlaces)
        Returns a formatted BigDecimal with the minimum nubmer of decimal places specified without rounding. Usage: Utils.setMinimumDecimalPlaces(new BigDecimal("5"), 2) to 2.00 Utils.setMinimumDecimalPlaces(new BigDecimal("5.0675"), 2) to 5.0675
        Parameters:
        bigDecimal - BigDecimal to format.
        minDecimalPlaces - Minimum number of decimal places.
        Returns:
        Formatted BigDecimal.
